options.name: Arcanatech
options.description: Gain Access to Arcanatech Crafting. You can use Beginner and Novice Level Catalysts in your Arcanatech Recipes.

options.name: Craft : Acceleration Theory
options.description: When you apply your first Arcanatech Infusion to a Ranged Weapon, that weapon gains a +1 to Attack and +1 to Damage.

options.name: Compounded Magic
options.description: You can add an additional Infusion to any Arcanatech Enhancements you Craft.

options.name: Arcanatech Catalyst Expert
options.description: Gain +1 Spell Damage. Additionally, Catalysts that you create count as 1 tier higher for the purpose of Arcanatech Recipes.

options.name: Exo-Enhancements
options.description: Your Aracanatech Enhancements can be installed seamlessly on top of their organic counterparts, mitigating the need to remove body parts. Enhancements installed in this way do not cause the penalty to maximum Health.

options.name: Improved Arcanatech
options.description: Gain +1 Engineering. Additionally, you can use Journeyman Catalysts in your Arcanatech Recipes at Level 7, Expert at 9 and Master at 11.
